Reviews.Title: Cheap accessories.
Reviews.Author: Joe m
Reviews.Content: The camera itself is great. But all the accessories that come with this kit are very cheap in quality. The tripod bent the very first time I tried to use it. The bag is as cheap as can be and provides no protection. The additional filters I'm sure are good to have but buy for the average person, these you will most likely never use.  In the stores like best buy, etc.  the camera with both lenses is the same price as this kit.  So it's still a great price. Just make sure you buy a better case and definitely a better tripod.
